item.title: CVE-2023-0462|2023-09-20T13:40:43.213Z -- n%2Fa -- foreman
item.description: An arbitrary code execution flaw was found in Foreman. This issue may allow an admin user to execute arbitrary code on the underlying operating system by setting global parameters with a YAML payload.
